name: Pet of the Week – Rosy
description: Meet this week's Pet of the Week, an adventurous pit bull mix named Rosy! Rosy loves to chase tennis balls and will definitely pose for selfies so she can show off all her new human friends on social media.

affiliation.name: County of San Diego Communications Office

articleContent: Meet this week’s Pet of the Week, an adventurous pit bull mix named Rosy! Rosy loves to chase tennis balls and will definitely pose for selfies so she can show off all her new human friends on social media. If you’re interested in adopting Rosy, please visit www.SDDAC.com.
